about_the_game:
In the heart of Animatlas, a world once brimming with diverse species, a battle for survival unfolds. Welcome to Bestiary Survivors, a roguelite, hack-and-slash adventure where bravery and strategy are your only weapons against the dragon apocalypse. A once-thriving sanctuary now teeters on the brink of annihilation, its future shrouded in darkness.

Yet, amidst the despair, a glimmer of hope persists. It's time for the animal heroes to rise, to face the fury of the dragons, and to reclaim their homeland. Harness the power of the elements, master your weapons, unlock unique clan abilities, and face the great dragons in epic battles.

A world waits to be saved, quests to be completed, and legends to be made. Embark on a journey where your choices could unravel the roots of darkness. Are you prepared to accept the challenge?

Features:


  • Fight against thousands of dragons.
  • Delve deep into battles with 7 formidable dragon bosses and uncover the hidden tales of Animatlas.
  • Master Normal and Focus attacks for strategic combat.
  • Evolve your weapon and customize your ideal build.
  • Upgrade your character by Purifying Shrines for elemental enhancement or Destroying them for immediate effects.
  • Your choices in destroying shrines can determine which dragon rules the world, leading you closer to the boss battle.
  • Utilize the power of 5 Elements (Stone, Fire, Cold, Lightning, Chaos) to boost your weapon or skills.
  • With unique Clan abilities, survive in challenging environments.
  • Unlock new in-game content by completing quests. Aim for difficult achievements as your trophies.

Feedbacks:


(We will actively review and consider any feedback regarding our game play or development that you provide in the Steam community or the Discord channel mentioned above. Your opinions on our game play or development are highly valued and will help us improve the game. Thank you!)
